title: Lili Reinhart honors the late Luke Perry with a slideshow of photos ahead of Riverdale's premiere
text:
He tragically passed away in March after suffering a massive stroke.

And on Tuesday, Lili Reinhart took to Instagram to honor Luke Perry's memory, with a slideshow of photos featuring her former Riverdale co-star.

The beauty shared snaps on both her timeline and Stories, and reflected on what happened in each photo.

For him: On Tuesday, Lili Reinhart, 23, took to Instagram to honor the late Luke Perry's memory, with a slideshow of photos featuring her former co-star

'Tonight’s episode, and all episodes for the rest of our run, are for Luke. We love, honor, and cherish his memory every single day,' began the 23-year-old, alongside her timeline post.

'I only wish he were here to see how many lives he touched with happiness and laughter. I know he’s watching from above. We love you, Luke.'

The slideshow featured several group shots of several of the Riverdale cast mates.

Documentation: The beauty shared snaps on both her timeline and Stories, and reflected on what happened in each photo

Having fun on set! One candid snap saw Luke modeling an unkempt wig as he playfully posed behind Lili

Memories: Most of the snaps documented a press trip the cast took to New York. Luke is pictured with his on-screen son, KJ Apa, 22

Most of the snaps documented a press trip the cast took to New York.

Lili and Luke were joined by co-stars KJ Apa, who plays Archie Andrews on the show, and Mädchen Amick, who portrays Lili's mother, Alice Cooper.

'It was a special trip for the four of us. And I'll never forget it,' she wrote in one photo.

His role: Since 2017, Luke played Fred Andrews on the hit CW drama

In most of the snaps, Lili and Luke were joined by co-stars KJ, who plays Archie Andrews on the show, and Mädchen Amick, who portrays Lili's mother, Alice Cooper

On March 4 of this year, Luke tragically passed away after suffering a massive stroke.

The late actor left behind fiance Wendy Madison Bauer along with daughter Sophie , 19, and son Jack, 22.

Riverdale season four premieres Tuesday on the CW at 8 p.m. ET.
